'Lottia gigantea', common name the 'owl limpet', 'giant owl limpet' or 'solitary
giant owl limpet', is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod
mollusc in the family Lottiidae. Its genome has been [http://genome.jgi-
psf.org/Lotgi1/Lotgi1.home.html sequenced] at the Joint Genome Institute.
